name: 2 Girls 4 Ducks
description:
Introduction:

Hi, this is a 3D Unity Game group project made for my Game Programming 4 called "2 Girls 4 Ducks" done in pair work. This is the first ever Photon Multiplayer game made using Photon Pun & Photon Chat and using its multiplayer networking functionalities and network programming.

Game Made By: 

Haoting (Core Systems), Hamzah (Me, Networking)

Responsibilities:

  • Setup networking functionalities for create/join rooms, kicking of player, chatting with other player in lobby
  • Made the characters to sync for both Host and Client which includes transform and animations
  • Debug Programming Issues
  • Test Game Builds thoroughly for each game feature
  • Import Free Unity 3D Art Assets from Unity Asset Store
  • Implement 3D Models into background environment level aesthetically
  • Implement UI for Networking UI Canvas & Prefabs

Game's Story Description:

Arisa Chan has an evil twin sister and decided to blow each other up using the newly 4 empowered ducks that has its own unique abilities! Use and plant the 4 different ducks and make your own combo playstyle to blow your evil twin up!

Controls:

Arisa Chan (Play with other PC/Laptop Device and Join/Create Room): Keyboard

Move: W, A, S, D  |  Deploy Bomb: Spacebar  |   Chose Bomb Type: Key 1, 2, 3, 4

Choosing Duck Bombs:

Default Duck: Key 1

Vortex Duck: Key 2

Time-Travelling Duck: Key 3

Nuclear Duck: Key 4
